entry.title: 1Panel SQL注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： 1Panel SQL注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-39907

漏洞类型： SQL注入

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： CVE-2024-39907是1Panel服务器管理控制面板中的一个严重安全漏洞，涉及多个SQL注入点，可能导致远程代码执行（RCE）。该漏洞存在于1Panel的多个接口中，由于过滤不足，攻击者可以实现任意文件写入，最终导致远程代码执行。1Panel是一个基于Web的Linux服务器管理控制面板，提供图形界面进行服务器管理。此漏洞影响1Panel v1.10.9-lts及更早版本，已在v1.10.12-tls2中修复。

产品厂商： 1Panel

产品名称： 1Panel Control Panel

影响版本： version <= 1.10.9-lts

来源： https://github.com/vulhub/vulhub/blob/295340d393805c2b6d22549868d5a54764488ec0/1panel%2FCVE-2024-39907%2FREADME.md

类型： vulhub/vulhub:github issues

来源概述

CVE-2024-39907: In-Depth Analysis of SQL Injection Vulnerability in 1Panel Control Panel

CVE-2024-39907 is a critical security vulnerability affecting the 1Panel server management control panel, involving multiple SQL injection points that could lead to remote code execution (RCE). Below is a detailed technical analysis of this vulnerability.

Vulnerability Overview

CVE-2024-39907 is a collection of multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities present in the 1Panel control panel. These vulnerabilities exist across several interfaces of 1Panel, where insufficient filtering could allow attackers to achieve arbitrary file writes and ultimately remote code execution (RCE)12.

1Panel is a web-based Linux server management control panel that provides a graphical interface for server administration. This vulnerability affects 1Panel v1.10.9-lts and earlier versions, and has been patched in v1.10.12-tls2.

Reference links:

  • nuclei-templates/http/cves/2024/CVE-2024-39907.yaml at main · projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates
  • https://hub.docker.com/r/moelin/1panel

Vulnerability Environment

Execute the following command to start a vulnerable instance of 1Panel v1.10.10-lts:

  • Default port: 10086
  • Default username: 1panel
  • Default password: 1panel_password
  • Default entrance: entrance

Then access http://your-ip:10086/entrance to see the login page and log in using the default credentials.

Vulnerability Reproduction

The vulnerability primarily exists in the API interfaces of 1Panel, particularly the /api/v1/hosts/command/search endpoint. Attackers can trigger SQL injection by carefully crafting request parameters2.

A typical proof-of-concept (PoC) request is as follows:

This attempts to create a database file to confirm whether the injection is successful.

Limitations and Considerations

  1. Valid session required: As shown by the psession=you-session cookie, the attacker must first obtain valid authentication credentials.
  2. SQLite-specific syntax: This PoC uses SQLite-specific commands, indicating that the 1Panel backend uses SQLite database.

漏洞信息

漏洞名称： 1Panel SQL注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

entry.title: 1Panel控制面板SQL注入漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： 1Panel控制面板SQL注入漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-39907

漏洞类型： SQL注入

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： CVE-2024-39907是1Panel控制面板中存在的多个SQL注入漏洞集合，这些漏洞存在于1Panel的多个接口中，部分注入点由于过滤不善，可能导致攻击者实现任意文件写入，最终达成远程命令执行(RCE)。1Panel是一款基于Web的Linux服务器管理控制面板，提供服务器管理的图形化界面。该漏洞影响1Panel v1.10.9-lts及更早版本，已在v1.10.12-tls版本中得到修复。

产品厂商： 1Panel

产品名称： 1Panel控制面板

影响版本： version <= 1.10.9-lts

来源： https://github.com/vulhub/vulhub/blob/295340d393805c2b6d22549868d5a54764488ec0/1panel%2FCVE-2024-39907%2FREADME.zh-cn.md

类型： vulhub/vulhub:github issues

来源概述

CVE-2024-39907：1Panel控制面板SQL注入漏洞深度分析

CVE-2024-39907是一个影响1Panel服务器管理控制面板的严重安全漏洞，涉及多个SQL注入点，可能导致远程命令执行(RCE)。以下是对该漏洞的详细技术分析。

漏洞概述

CVE-2024-39907是1Panel控制面板中存在的多个SQL注入漏洞集合，这些漏洞存在于1Panel的多个接口中，部分注入点由于过滤不善，可能导致攻击者实现任意文件写入，最终达成远程命令执行(RCE)12。

1Panel是一款基于Web的Linux服务器管理控制面板，提供服务器管理的图形化界面。该漏洞影响1Panel v1.10.9-lts及更早版本，已在v1.10.12-tls版本中得到修复2。

参考链接：

  • nuclei-templates/http/cves/2024/CVE-2024-39907.yaml at main · projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates
  • https://hub.docker.com/r/moelin/1panel

漏洞环境

执行如下命令启动一个有漏洞的1Panel v1.10.10-lts：

  • 默认端口：10086
  • 默认账户：1panel
  • 默认密码：1panel_password
  • 默认输入：entrance

然后访问http://your-ip:10086/entrance即可看到登录页面，使用默认账户密码登录。

漏洞复现

漏洞主要存在于1Panel的API接口中，特别是/api/v1/hosts/command/search接口。攻击者可以通过精心构造的请求参数触发SQL注入2。

一个典型的POC请求如下：

通过尝试创建数据库文件来确认注入是否成功。

限制与注意事项

  1. 需要有效会话：如Cookie中的psession=you-session所示，攻击者需要先获取有效认证凭证
  2. SQLite特定语法：这个POC使用了SQLite特有的命令，表明1Panel后端使用SQLite数据库

entry.title: D-Link DPH-400S/SE VoIP Phone v101 contains hardcoded provisioning variables, including
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jwww-fv33-3qg5

CVSS 评分： 9.8

参考链接：

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-45784

  • https://cybermaya.in/posts/Post-37

  • https://www.dlink.com/en/security-bulletin

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jwww-fv33-3qg5

描述：

D-Link DPH-400S/SE VoIP Phone v1.01 contains hardcoded provisioning variables, including PROVIS_USER_PASSWORD, which may expose sensitive user credentials. An attacker with access to the firmware image can extract these credentials using static analysis tools such as strings or xxd, potentially leading to unauthorized access to device functions or user accounts. This vulnerability exists due to insecure storage of sensitive information in the firmware binary.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-jwww-fv33-3qg5

entry.title: PowerPC Meterpreter 漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： PowerPC Meterpreter 漏洞

漏洞类型： 其他

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： PowerPC Meterpreter 在多个目标和早期版本（如0.0.6）中可靠地失败，可能是编译器问题，但目前PPC meterpreter已损坏。

产品厂商： Rapid7

产品名称： Metasploit Framework

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/issues/20325

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

来源概述

There seems to be an issue in PowerPC Meterpreter:

It reliably fails across various targets and even for earlier versions of Mettle - i.e. 0.0.6. There’s a chance it’s compiler issue, but need further investigating as for now, PPC meterpreter is broken.

entry.title: CVE-2025-33053 Exploit via Malicious .URL File and WebDAV
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： CVE-2025-33053 Exploit via Malicious .URL File and WebDAV

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-33053

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该模块通过生成恶意的.URL文件，指向一个受信任的LOLBAS二进制文件，并设计参数以触发意外行为，从而利用CVE-2025-33053。可选地，生成一个有效载荷并托管在指定的WebDAV目录上。当受害者打开快捷方式时，它将尝试访问WebDAV路径，可能通过受信任的二进制文件导致远程代码执行。

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/1d27be2c1d8b82ec83c5c68cce48b702313bf24d/modules%2Fexploits%2Fwindows%2Ffileformat%2Fcve_2025_33053.rb

entry.title: Palo Alto GlobalProtect 反射型跨站脚本漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Palo Alto GlobalProtect 反射型跨站脚本漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-0133

漏洞类型： 跨站可执行脚本

漏洞等级： 中危

漏洞描述： 这是一个针对CVE-2025-0133的POC，仅适用于启用了GlobalProtect网关或门户的PAN-OS防火墙配置。它通过多线程检查多个URL中的问题，并允许设置超时和将结果输出到文件中。

产品厂商： Palo Alto

产品名称： GlobalProtect

来源： https://github.com/wiseep/CVE-2025-0133

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • CVE-2025-0133.py
  • README.md

来源概述

Description:

It is a POC for CVE-2025-0133 that is applicable only to PAN-OS firewall configurations with an enabled GlobalProtect gateway or portal.
It checks issue on multiple URLs that accepts from file, with custom thread. You can also set you timeout and get results in a file.

Example usage:

MacBook-Wiseep-Dev:github root# python3.9 CVE-2025-0133.py -h

usage: CVE-2025-0133.py [-h] –file FILE [–thread THREAD] [–timeout TIMEOUT] –output OUTPUT

Palo Alto GlobalProtect XSS Scanner

optional arguments:
-h, –help show this help message and exit

–file FILE Input file containing URLs

–thread THREAD Number of threads

–timeout TIMEOUT Timeout in seconds

–output OUTPUT Output file for results
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Palo Alto GlobalProtect 反射型跨站脚本漏洞

entry.title: Windows WebDAV Remote Code Execution Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Windows WebDAV Remote Code Execution Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-33053

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： CVE-2025-33053是一个严重的WebDAV相关远程代码执行（RCE）漏洞，允许攻击者通过指向远程WebDAV共享的恶意.LNK快捷方式文件执行任意代码。利用此漏洞需要目标系统上的WebClient服务存在并运行，以及通过WebDAV的UNC路径处理处于活动状态。此检查器实时验证这些利用条件，适用于蓝队、系统管理员和漏洞审计人员。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： Windows

来源： https://github.com/TheTorjanCaptain/CVE-2025-33053-Checker-PoC

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • CVE-2025-33053_checker.ps1
  • LICENSE
  • README.md
  • misc

来源概述

CVE-2025-33053 Simple Vulnerability Checker (PowerShell)

A lightweight PowerShell script to detect if a Windows system is potentially vulnerable to CVE-2025-33053 — a critical WebDAV-related Remote Code Execution (RCE) vulnerability.

🛡️ About CVE-2025-33053

This vulnerability allows attackers to execute malicious .LNK shortcut files that point to remote WebDAV shares, resulting in arbitrary code execution.

The exploit requires the following conditions to be true on the target system:

  1. WebClient service is present and running.
  2. UNC path handling via WebDAV is active.

This checker tests for both these real-world preconditions.

✅ What This Checker Does (Real-Time Verification)

CheckPurpose
🔍 WebClient Service StatusConfirms if WebDAV support is active on the system.
🔍 UNC Path Handling via Test-PathChecks if the system tries to resolve remote WebDAV UNC paths (core to CVE exploitation).

If both checks pass — the system is potentially exploitable via CVE-2025-33053.

🖥️ How to Run (Usage)

  1. Save the above PowerShell script as checker.ps1.

  2. Open PowerShell as Administrator.

  3. If script execution is restricted, temporarily allow running scripts:

  1. Run the script: .\CVE-2025-33053_checker.ps1

🔍 Why is this a Real-Time Checker?

✔️ WebClient Service Status is checked live — no assumptions.
✔️ UNC Path Handling uses actual OS calls (Test-Path) — which triggers real UNC resolution logic the same way a .LNK exploit would do.

✅ If UNC handling resolves (even for non-existent paths), this reflects the exact behavior that enables exploitation — thus this is not theoretical, but a direct simulation of CVE exploitation preconditions.

⚠️ Notes

This script does not exploit the vulnerability.
It is a safe, read-only checker for determining potential exposure.
Suitable for blue teams, sysadmins, vulnerability auditors.
Only for educational purposes. Do not run on systems you are not authorised to run.

🧩 Related PoC Development

A full Proof-of-Concept (PoC) exploiting CVE-2025-33053 is under development in this repository.

🏷️ License

MIT License — free to use for educational and defensive purposes.

🤝 Contributing

Pull requests welcome!
Feel free to suggest improvements or raise issues.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Windows WebDAV Remote Code Execution Vu

entry.title: The Recover WooCommerce Cart Abandonment, Newsletter, Email Marketing, Marketing Automation By
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-rr4m-6xx9-f2wg

CVSS 评分： 9.8

参考链接：

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-1562

  • https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/browser/wp-marketing-automations/tags/2.5.0/includes/api/plugin_status/class-bwfan-api-install-and-activate-plugin.php

  • https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/browser/wp-marketing-automations/tags/2.5.0/includes/class-bwfan-db.php#L153

  • https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/changeset/3305437/wp-marketing-automations/trunk/admin/class-bwfan-admin.php

  • https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/changeset/3305437/wp-marketing-automations/trunk/includes/abstracts/class-bwfan-api-base.php

  • https://plugins.trac.wordpress.org/changeset/3305437/wp-marketing-automations/trunk/includes/class-bwfan-api-loader.php

  • https://www.wordfence.com/threat-intel/vulnerabilities/id/094972e6-7e02-4060-b069-e39c8cde9331?source=cve

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-rr4m-6xx9-f2wg

描述：

The Recover WooCommerce Cart Abandonment, Newsletter, Email Marketing, Marketing Automation By FunnelKit plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to unauthorized arbitrary plugin installation due to a missing capability check on the install_or_activate_addon_plugins() function and a weak nonce hash in all versions up to, and including, 3.5.3. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to install arbitrary plugins on the site that can be leveraged to further infect a vulnerable site.
